description:
Prime Bed-Stuy location! We are a short 20 minute express train from Manhattan. This 2.5 bed home is in the heart of the Historical District of Stuyvesant Heights. This stunning duplex apartment is in a private brownstone and has its own garden, two bedrooms and a lofted 3rd bed, and plenty of room to relax and take in the unique decor. 

Our place is close to the A/C train to Manhattan and easily reachable from JFK and LaGuradia. We are near some amazing Brooklyn restaurants, bars, and cafes.

Art, antiques, open kitchen, fresh coffee, nice neighbors, beautiful neighborhood, and lots of love and good energy.

2 entrances.

We will be on-call!
name: Landmarked 1899 Brownstone with private garden
review: Great spacious home in a neighborhood near everything. Quick walk to the subway and to many great restaurants and lounges.
